bio.summary: Funk inflicted and soulfully convicted, Faking David is original, intelligent, and upbeat music that can make those that like to dance; groove, and those that don't; sit back and groove anyway. This colorful ensemble radiates an energy that will make your entity relate to the rhythms; your pinky-toes tap to the moves; and your spinal chord jig your brain. Their soul scribing create a whole genre of yummy new alternative music exploring their social commentary and emotion commotion. Read more on Last.fm
bio.content: Funk inflicted and soulfully convicted, Faking David is original, intelligent, and upbeat music that can make those that like to dance; groove, and those that don't; sit back and groove anyway. This colorful ensemble radiates an energy that will make your entity relate to the rhythms; your pinky-toes tap to the moves; and your spinal chord jig your brain. Their soul scribing create a whole genre of yummy new alternative music exploring their social commentary and emotion commotion. With live performances that are high in energy and full of sass, this painted bunch brings funk to the stage with traces of purple and orange. Read more on Last.fm.
